name: Automated SEO Blog Publishing with WordPress, OpenAI & Perplexity

user.name: LukaszB
user.bio:
AI Automation Expert | Web & Mobile App Integrator
With 2+ years of experience, I build smart automations, web & mobile app workflows, and scalable platforms using tools like n8n, Make, and more. I help businesses reduce operational costs, save time, and scale faster with AI-powered solutions.  For business enquiries, send me an email at  kontakt@lumizone.pl

description:
# Automated Blog n8n System ‚Äì Professional Articles in Minutes  

Most blogs publish words.  
This system publishes **experiences**.  

With one simple row in Google Sheets, your blog comes alive with **SEO & RAO-friendly WordPress articles** ‚Äî written, illustrated, and published without lifting a finger.  

What makes it different? Not just automation. Not just speed. It‚Äôs the way **images are woven between paragraphs**, giving your readers a richer, more engaging journey. Instead of walls of text, every article feels alive ‚Äî easier to read, easier to share, and impossible to ignore.  

---

## ‚ú® What this workflow delivers  
- **End-to-end automation**: idea ‚Üí research ‚Üí writing ‚Üí visuals ‚Üí publishing.  
- **SEO & RAO optimized**: content built to rank in Google *and* surface in AI systems.  
- **Built-in storytelling with visuals**: Perfect Images embedded directly inside the article body, making every post more compelling.  
- **Seamless WordPress publishing**: titles, excerpts, slugs, body, and featured image in one click.  
- **Effortless setup**: designed so anyone can run it, even without technical skills.  

---

## üîß Requirements  
- Google Sheets (title, short_description, created)  
- WordPress site with REST API + credentials  
- OpenAI API key (text + image generation)  
- Perplexity API key (research)  
- Cloudinary account with unsigned upload preset  
- *(Optional)* Pexels API key for stock header images  

---

## ‚úÖ Perfect for  
- Bloggers who want their content to *stand out* visually.  
- Agencies managing client blogs and SEO projects.  
- Businesses that need engaging, living content on autopilot.  
- Anyone ready to turn a silent blog into a **beautiful, automated publishing machine**.
